original_text: In the ninth month of the fifth year of Jehoiakim son of Josiah king of Judah, a time of fasting before the Lord was proclaimed for all the people in Jerusalem and those who had come from the towns of Judah.
korean_text: 유다의 요시야 왕의 아들 여호야김의 제오년 구월에 예루살렘 모든 백성과 유다 성읍들에서 예루살렘에 이른 모든 백성이 여호와 앞에서 금식을 선포한지라

sentences.original_text: of the fifth year of Jehoiakim
son of Josiah king of Judah
a time of fasting before the Lord
for all the people in Jerusalem
and those who had come from the towns of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 유다 여러 고을에서 온 사람들을 위해
